problem: 如图,AB为⊙O的直径,C为⊙O上一点,AD和过点C的切线互相垂直,垂足为D．若∠DCA=55°,则∠CAO的度数为()
comment: 本题考查了切线的性质,圆的有关知识,熟练运用切线的性质是本题的关键．
problem_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the diameter of ⊙O, C is a point on ⊙O, the tangent line between AD and passing point C is perpendicular to each other, and the vertical foot is D. If ∠DCA = N_0, then the degree of ∠CAO is ()
